home.chatActionSheet.title: Like to chat with us?
onboarding.text.intro: <text>BrightID uses the people you know</text><text>to enforce one-account-per-person</text><text>for important applications like</text><text>voting and universal basic income.</text>
onboarding.text.privacy: <text>Prove you're a unique person</text><text>while preserving your privacy.</text>
signup.header.title: SignUp
signup.text.whatsYouName: What do your friends know you by?
signup.text.infoNotShared: Your name and photo will never be shared with apps or stored on servers
signup.placeholder.name: Name
signup.alert.nameTooShort: Your name must be at least 2 characters
signup.alert.photoMissing: A photo is required. Please press enter on the keyboard.
recovery.header.title: Recovery Code
recovery.text.askTrustedConnections: Ask your trusted connections to scan this code.
qrcode.text.scanCode: <text>Hey {{name}}, scan a code and</text><text>make a new connection today</text>
qrcode.alert.text.codeSingle: This QR code can be used to connect with a single user before it expires.
qrcode.alert.text.codeGroup: This QR code is designed for many people to connect simultaneously.
qrcode.alert.shareLinkSingle: Share this link with one friend
qrcode.alert.connectGroup: Make a group connection with {{name}} on BrightID: {{link}}
pendingConnections.label.rating: How well do you know this connection?
pendingConnections.text.rating: Your answer will help us prevent attacks
pendingConnection.text.errorConnecting: Error while connecting. Please try to reconnect.
pendingConnection.text.errorExpired: The connection expired. Please try to reconnect.
pendingConnection.text.errorMyself: You can not connect to yourself.
connections.flagActionSheet.infoFlagImpa: Note that reporting {{name}} will negatively affect their BrightID verification, and the report might be shown to other users.
connections.removeActionSheet.title: Remove connection
connections.removeActionSheet.info: Are you sure you want to remove connection with {{name}}? You can reconnect anytime.
connectionsSearch.text.chooseSortMethod: Choose one of the methods below
groups.text.noEligibleConnection: No existing connections are eligible for this group, please come back later..
groups.alert.text.inviteSuccess: You invited {{name}} successfully to the group
groups.alert.text.leaveGroup: Are you sure you want to leave this group?
groups.alert.text.dismissMember: Are you sure you want to dismiss {{name}} from this group?
groups.alert.title.errorDismissMember: Error dismissing member from the group
groups.alert.text.addAdmin: Are you sure you want to make {{name}} an admin for this group?
createGroup.text.cofounders: To create a group, you must select two co-founders
createGroup.alert.text.nameMissing: Please add a name for group
createGroup.alert.text.nameTooShort: The group name must be at least 2 characters
apps.text.pendingLink:
Linking your account in {{context}}
 to your BrightID ...
apps.text.notSponsored:
You're not sponsored.
Please find an app below to sponsor you.
apps.alert.text.checkWebsite: To find out more about {{name}}, check out their website!
notifications.alert.text.rejectGroupInvi: Are you sure you want to reject joining this group?
backup.text.chooseTrustedConnections: Choose three or more trusted connections to back up your BrightID.
backup.text.enterPassword: Enter a password to encrypt your backup data with:
backup.text.uploadingData: Uploading encrypted data to backup server ...
backup.alert.text.passwordConfirmNoMatch: Password and confirm password does not match.
backup.alert.text.passwordTooShort: Your password must be at least 8 characters long.

profile.placeholder.name: Enter Name
